Interface UserBusinessInterface<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserBusinessService

    public interface UserBusinessInterface<T>

    • Method Detail

      • register

        boolean register(T user)
          throws ItemAlreadyExistsException
        Method to add a user to the database
        Parameters:
        user - A user to be registered
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean stating success or failure of registration
        Throws:
        ItemAlreadyExistsException - This exception is thrown in the event that the supplied object already exists in the database, and duplicates are not allowed

      • authenticate

        T authenticate(T credentials)
        throws ItemNotFoundException
        Method that handles attempted user login
        Parameters:
        credentials - A user model containing the credentials a user is attempting to log in with
        Returns:
        The user's ID upon a success. -1 upon a failure
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that no item matching the parameters is found in the database

      • findUserByID

        T findUserByID(int id)
        throws ItemNotFoundException
        Method to find a single user using that user's ID
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the user being looked for
        Returns:
        A found user, ID will be -1 if not found
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that no item matching the parameters is found in the database

      • findAllUsers

        java.util.List<T> findAllUsers()
                        throws ItemNotFoundException
        A method that returns a list of every user in the database
        Returns:
        A list of all users within the database
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that no item is found in the database

      • editUser

        boolean editUser(T user)
          throws ItemNotFoundException
        A function that allows user information to be edited
        Parameters:
        user - The user to be edited
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean denoting whether or not the user's record was successfully updated
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that no item matching the parameters is found in the database

      • removeUser

        boolean removeUser(T user)
            throws ItemNotFoundException
        A function to remove a user from the database
        Parameters:
        user - The user to be deleted
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean denoting whether or not the user was successfully removed
        Throws:
        ItemNotFoundException - This exception is thrown in the event that no item matching the parameters is found in the database
